episodes.title: Escaping a 22 year Modern Day Cult w/ Rashida
episodes.description: In this episode of Cultura Truth Project, Jose & Daniel interview author, nutritionist and former Buddhafield cult member, @radhiagleis2640. She shares her story of escaping a cult, and the parallels between societies of the 70's and today. En este episodio de Cultura Truth Project, Jose & Daniel entrevistan autora, nutritionista y ex miembro del culto de Buddhafield @radhiagleis2640. Ella comparte su historia de escapar el culto, y el paralelo enter la sociedad de los 70 y de hoy. #cults #mindcontrol #narcissism #interviews #podcasts Follow the Podcast on Spreaker & all major platforms Sigue al Podcast en Spreaker y an las otras plataformas: https://www.spreaker.com/show/... /> https://open.spotify.com/show/... /> https://www.iheart.com/podcast... /> https://podcasts.apple.com/us/... /> Suscribete a nuestro canal en Rumble: https://rumble.com/c/c-5564289 Get your copy of The Followers: https://www.amazon.com/Followe... .
